Title: Armour of God
Writer: Barry Wong (original story), Edward Tang (screenplay), Cheuk-Hon Szeto (screenplay), Ken Lowe (screenplay), John Sheppard (screenplay)
Actors: Jackie Chan, Alan Tam, Lola Forner, Rosamund Kwan
Plot: Jackie Chan plays an ex-singer-turned-fortune-hunter, whose ex-girlfriend is kidnapped by an evil cult. Her fiance, an old friend of Jackie's, turns to him for help - as the kidnappers intended... lots of cooool, Jackie style action and laughs.
Production: Golden Harvest Company, Paragon Films Ltd.
